title: Master a Subject & Gain Foundational Qualifications
description: Become an expert in the subject you want to teach. A bachelor's degree in that subject (e.g., BSc in Chemistry, BA in English) is essential for credibility. For school subjects, strong A/L results are a minimum requirement.
qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in a specific subject
institutes: Any recognized Sri Lankan or foreign university

title: Develop Teaching Skills & Technical Proficiency
description: Gain some teaching or tutoring experience, even if informal. Simultaneously, become proficient with the tools of online education: digital whiteboards, screen recording software, video editing basics, and online meeting platforms.

title: Start Tutoring & Build a Brand
description: Begin tutoring individual students or small groups online. Create a social media presence (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok) to share short educational content. This helps build your brand, attract students, and serves as a portfolio of your teaching style.
institutes: Building a personal website/social media presence

title: Create & Sell Digital Educational Products
description: Scale your impact and income by creating digital products. This could include pre-recorded video courses, PDF notes and tutorials, practice question banks, or subscription-based learning platforms. This moves you from trading time for money to a more scalable model.

title: Establish an EdTech Platform or Academy
description: Evolve from a solo creator into a business. You can hire other tutors, build a comprehensive online learning platform (like a local Coursera), and establish a recognized educational brand. This involves business management and strategic planning.
